text: These are the squads for the countries that played in the 1922 South American Championship held in Brazil. The participating countries were Argentina, Brazil, Chile and Uruguay. The teams plays in a single round-robin tournament, earning two points for a win, one point for a draw, and zero points for a loss.Southamerican Championship 1922 by Martín Tabeira on the RSSSFList of matches on World Football.net ==Argentina== Head Coach: n/i ==Brazil== Head coach: Laís ==Chile== Head Coach: Juan C.
